Class Text

com.rubynaxela.kyanite.game.gui.Text
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable, TextStyle, Transformable, org.jsfml.graphics.Drawable
public class Text extends Text
Represents a graphical text that can be transformed and drawn to a render target.

      public Text.Alignment getAlignment()

    • setAlignment

      public void setAlignment(@NotNull @NotNull Text.Alignment alignment)
      Sets the alignment mode of this text. The default value is TOP_LEFT. This does not properly align multiline texts in horizontal direction. For proper multiline text alignment, build a CompoundEntity consisting of multiple Text objects.
      Parameters:
      alignment - the new alignment mode of this text
